titleStmt.title: Manuale catholicorum A manuall for true Catholickes.
titleStmt.author: Crashaw, William, 1572-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Leonard Becket, and are to be sold at his shop in the Temple neere the Church,

notesStmt.note: "Enchiridion piarum precum et meditationum" and "A handful: or rather A heartfull of holy meditations and prayers" have separate title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
